title: Simon Cowell's face looks frozen as he celebrates 60th with booze and cigarettes
text:

Music mogul Simon Cowell looked red-faced and plastic as he celebrated his 60th birthday last night.

Simon was snapped with a whole lot of colour in his cheeks as he set off with a bottle of wine and a few packs of cigarettes.

Earlier in the night, Simon took a break from the America's Got Talent filming schedule for a family dinner to celebrate the milestone.

He and girlfriend Lauren Silverman were joined by their son Eric, five, and Lauren's son Adam, 13, as the four hit up Nobu in Malibu.

Adam and little Eric even drew inspiration from Simon's style, opting for crisp white shirts.

Simon and Lauren looked every inch the glamorous celebrities.

(Image: BACKGRID)

While Simon had his classic tight white shirt unbuttoned down to his navel, Lauren went for a simple but chic black and white dress.

She paired it with a clutch bag and some bangles in an eye-catching ensemble.

Simon's recently undergone a transformation after he lost a mighty amount of weight from a vegan diet.

(Image: Getty)

Speaking on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, he revealed that he had to give up either smoking, drinking or his unhealthy diet.

The X Factor judge dished: "I went to see this doctor in London. We did some tests. And then a month later he said, 'You have the worst diet I've ever met from any patient.'

"So I went, 'Okay, out of the smoking, the drinking, and diet, what do I have to drop?' and he said, 'The diet'.

"So I said, 'I'm in!'"

Comedian Frank Skinner recently poked fun at Simon and his cosmetic procedures, laughing that "it was done in darkness".

The comic joked: "I remember Simon Cowell when he had his first face.

"I've known him a long time. The current one is a bit Slipknot. It's actually quite terrifying.

"It looks like his nose is juggling his eyes. They are at different levels.

"A man of his money you'd think could get the best plastic surgeon in the world.

"I think it's to do with the power cuts we had recently, I think it was done in darkness. It really is shocking.

"If he was born like that you'd feel cruel saying it but as he's picked it out of a catalogue of some kind, I presume it was a double spread and there was a fold in the middle."
description: Simon's face appeared nipped and tucked as he partied with a bottle of wine and cigarettes after a fancy family dinner
